Chinese Definition:
Pictophonetic: 雍 indicates the sound; 瓦 (pottery) conveys the meaning.
  • ⿱ Above to below
    • 雍 [ yōng ] harmony, union; harmonious
    • 瓦 [ wǎ ] tile; pottery, earthenware
①一种盛水或酒等的陶器：水瓮。酒瓮。菜瓮。瓮城(围绕在城门外的小城)。瓮牖(yǒu)绳枢(以破瓮作窗户，以草绳系户枢。形容家里穷)。
②姓氏。

甕字的基本解释

甕
wèng
见“瓮”。

甕字的汉语字典释义

[①]［wèng］
［《廣韻》烏貢切，去送，影。］
亦作“瓮1”。
(1)小口大腹的陶制汲水罐。
(2)盛酒浆的坛。
(3)大水缸。
(4)借指酒。
(5)装于瓮中。
(6)谓鼻不畅通。
(7)谓使声音变沉。
(8)姓。明有甕蕙。见《明清进士题名碑录索引》上。

甕字的康熙字典解释

【午集上】【瓦字部】　甕； 康熙笔画：18； 页码：页752第25
【廣韻】【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?烏貢切，同瓮。【玉篇】甖也。【韻會】沒甁也。【易·井卦】井谷射鮒，甕敝漏。【禮·檀弓】醯醢百甕。【李斯上秦始皇書】夫擊甕扣缶，彈箏搏髀，而歌呼嗚嗚，快耳目者，眞秦之聲也。　又【禮·儒行】蓬戸甕牖。【疏】甕牖者，謂牖牕圓如甕口也。又云：以敗甕口爲牖。【莊子·讓王篇】桑以爲樞，而甕牖二室。【註】屈桑條爲戸樞，破甕爲牖，各一室也。　又【莊子·人閒世】甕㼜大癭說齊桓公。【註】甕㼜，大癭貌。　又【集韻】亦作罋。又作?。【前漢·張騫傳】大宛國獻大鳥卵，如甕。【註】一作?。　又【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】?於容切，音雍。【前漢·西域傳】烏弋國有大鳥卵，如甕。【師古註】音平聲。　又【集韻】委勇切，音壅。又於用切，壅去聲。義?同。

urn
Basic explanation of words
urn
wèng

urn
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［wèng］
["Guangyun" Wu Gongqie, go to send, film. ]
Also known as "urn 1".
(1) A small-mouthed and big-belly pottery dipping pot.
(2) An altar containing wine syrup.
(3) Large water tank.
(4) Borrow refers to wine.
(5) Installed in the urn.
(6) It is said that the nose is not smooth.
(7) It is said that the sound becomes heavy.
(8) Last name. Ming You Weng Hui. See "Index to the Ming and Qing Jinshi Titles and Tablet Records".
urn
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Wu Ji 1] [Wa Zi Department] 　瓮; Kangxi strokes: 18; Page number: page 752 25
[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] [Rhyme Meeting] [Zheng Yun]? Wu Gongqie, the same urn. 【Jade articles】Poppy also. [Rhyme Club] There is no such thing. [Easy·Jing Gua] Jinggu shoots crucian carp, urn leaks. 【Ritual·Tan Gong】Hundred urns. [Li Si's Book of the First Emperor of Qin] The husband hits the urn and buckles the urn, flies the kite and beats, and the song is humming, the one who hears the ears and the eyes, and the voice of Qin.　[Rite·Confucianism] Pengshou Urn. 【Sparse】The urn is as round as the mouth of the urn. It also goes: Taking defeat as an example. [Zhuangzi·Langwang Chapter] Sang is the pivot, and the urn is in the second room. [Note] Qu Sang Tiao is the stub, and the broken urn is the stub, each with a room.　[Zhuangzi·Renxian Shi] Weng 㼜 Da Ying said Qi Huangong. [Note] Urn, big gall appearance.　[Jiyun] Also used as an urn. Do it again? [Previous Han·Zhang Qian's Biography] Dawan State presented large bird eggs, like urns. [Note] One for?.　[Jiyun] [Yunhui] [Zhengyun]? Yu Rongqie, Yin Yong. [Pre-Han · Western Regions Biography] Wuyi has a large bird's egg, such as an urn. [Shigu Note] Ping sound.　[Jiyun] We are brave and cut, and the sound is choked. I cut it again and choked off. Righteous? Same.
